1919.name: Green Climate Fund Pledges (USD per capita) (GCF (2017))
1919.description: Measures USD pledged per capita to the Green Climate Fund (GDF).

source.name: Green Climate Fund Pledges - GCF (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Original sources from the GCF datasets.
source.additionalInfo: Advanced economies have formally agreed to jointly mobilize USD 100 billion per year by 2020, from a variety of sources, to address the pressing mitigation and adaptation needs of developing countries.
